text: Ewald Lienen (born 28 November 1953) is a German football manager and former player. He is the current technical director of FC St. Pauli. ==Managerial record== Team From To Record MSV Duisburg 22 March 1993 1 November 1994 Hansa Rostock 1 July 1997 8 March 1999 1\.
